actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 101-683.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 425.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Mr. Lagomarsino demanded a second on the motion to suspend the rules.
On ordering a second Agreed to without objection.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Delaware River in the States of Pennsylvania and New Jersey as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system. States that the designation of such segments made by this Act with respect to the Gilbert Generating Station or the Point Pleasant Pumping Station shall not preclude or interfere with: (1) their operation or maintenance as authorized under any license or permit; (2) any replacement or modification that has no greater impact on such segments; or (3) relicensing or repermitting of such facilities. Designates a specified segment of the Delaware River and tributaries in Pennsylvania and New Jersey for study as a potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Delaware River in the States of Pennsylvania and New Jersey as components of the national wild and scenic rivers system.
